name: StreamViewerConfig
description: Current configuration of this Stream Viewer instance.

tags.name: streams
tags.description: A sequence of the streams this Stream Viewer is streaming.

tags.name: stream_id
tags.description: The streamId of the ADLINK Vision stream frame and inference data is being read from.

tags.name: inference_output_type
tags.description: What kind of Inference Engine output type is being applied to the stream.

tags.name: rtsp_streaming_address
tags.description: The address this stream is streaming from.
